alert.note: Alert for Cook; Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 9:23AM CDT until July 26 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT FOR EASTERN LAKE AND NORTHWESTERN COOK COUNTIES... At 922 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Waukegan to Schaumburg, moving east southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waukegan, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Hoffman Estates, Glenview, Buffalo Grove, Wheeling, Northbrook, North Chicago, Gurnee, Mundelein, Niles, Highland Park, Wilmette and Vernon Hills. Including the following interstates... I-90 between mile markers 60 and 69. I-94 between mile markers 5 and 37. I-294 between mile markers 5 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
